parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Custom Panels

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Opens given component or first component of given component type on specified info panel.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[setInfoPanel]] [infopanelId, componentClassOrType];

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> infoPanelId: [[String]] - info panel classname, or "left" or "right"

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> componentClassOrType: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if panel was successfully opened, [[false]] otherwise (e.g. opening GPS on player without GPS item or setting panel to vehicle that doesn't have such capability configured)

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>opens slingload assistant on right panel</value></part></template>
_result = [[setInfoPanel]] ["VehicleSystemsDisplayManagerComponentRight", "SlingLoadDisplayComponent"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Custom Info]], [[infoPanel]], [[infoPanels]], [[infoPanelComponents]], [[enableInfoPanelComponent]], [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]]
</value></part></template></root>
